preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 28 g of barium and 1 g of erbium using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 2 g of nickel and 7 g of terbium. 
 3. Combine all measured metals in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 4. Gradually add 100 g of filler (silica) to the metal mixture while stirring to ensure uniform distribution. 
 5. Add 50 g of binder to the mixture and stir thoroughly until a homogenous paste is formed.
